mapper.update: UPDATE cashbook SET cashbook_kind = #{cashbookKind}, category_name = #{categoryName}, cashbook_price = #{cashbookPrice}, cashbook_content = #{cashbookContent}, cashbook_date = #{cashbookDate}, update_date = NOW() WHERE cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
mapper.select: SELECT cashbook_id cashbookId, cashbook_kind cashbookKind, category_name categoryName, cashbook_price cashbookPrice, cashbook_content cashbookContent, cashbook_date cashbookDate, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM cashbook where cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cashbook( cashbook_kind, category_name, cashbook_price, cashbook_content, cashbook_date, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{cashbookKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashbookPrice}, #{cashbookContent}, #{cashbookDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT cashbook_kind cashbookKind, sum(cashbook_price) cashbookPrice, DAY(cashbook_date) dday FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date)=#{currentYear} AND MONTH(cashbook_date)=#{currentMonth} GROUP BY DAY(cashbook_date), cashbook_kind

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') AS "날짜" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "수입" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "지출" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "합계" FROM cashbook GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') DESC LIMIT 3
